( SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS count FROM teacher_certifications WHERE status = 2 AND deleted_at IS NULL GROUP BY user_id ) cert_count
( SELECT user_id, MIN(price_per_hour) AS price FROM teacher_teachings WHERE status = 1 AND deleted_at IS NULL GROUP BY user_id ) min_price

sql.if: AND ( u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR tp.real_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM teacher_teachings tt INNER JOIN subjects s ON tt.subject_id = s.id WHERE tt.user_id = u.id AND AND s.status = 1 AND s.deleted_at IS NULL AND s.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ) )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM teacher_teachings tt WHERE tt.user_id = u.id AND tt.stage_id = #{stageId} AND )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM teacher_teachings tt WHERE tt.user_id = u.id AND tt.subject_id = #{subjectId} AND )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM teacher_teachings tt WHERE tt.user_id = u.id AND tt.price_per_hour >= #{minPrice} AND )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM teacher_teachings tt WHERE tt.user_id = u.id AND tt.price_per_hour <= #{maxPrice} AND )

mapper.select:
SELECT u.id, u.nickname, tp.real_name, u.avatar, COALESCE(tp.rating, 0) AS rating, COALESCE(tp.rating_count, 0) AS rating_count, COALESCE(tp.teaching_years, 0) AS teaching_years, CASE WHEN cert_count.count > 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS certified, u.online_status, COALESCE(min_price.price, 0) AS min_price FROM users u LEFT JOIN teacher_profiles tp ON u.id = tp.user_id AND tp.deleted_at IS NULL LEFT JOIN ON u.id = cert_count.user_id LEFT JOIN ON u.id = min_price.user_id
ORDER BY u.online_status DESC, tp.rating DESC, u.created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT u.id) FROM users u LEFT JOIN teacher_profiles tp ON u.id = tp.user_id AND tp.deleted_at IS NULL

SELECT DISTINCT s.id, s.code, s.name, s.category, s.sort_order FROM teacher_teachings tt INNER JOIN subjects s ON tt.subject_id = s.id WHERE tt.user_id = #{userId} AND tt.status = 1 AND tt.deleted_at IS NULL AND s.status = 1 AND s.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY s.sort_order, s.id
SELECT MIN(price_per_hour) FROM teacher_teachings WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 1 AND deleted_at IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM teacher_certifications WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 2 AND deleted_at IS NULL

SELECT u.id, u.nickname, tp.real_name, u.avatar, tp.introduction, COALESCE(tp.teaching_years, 0) AS teaching_years, tp.teaching_style, COALESCE(tp.rating, 0) AS rating, COALESCE(tp.rating_count, 0) AS rating_count, CASE WHEN cert_count.count > 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS certified, u.online_status FROM users u LEFT JOIN teacher_profiles tp ON u.id = tp.user_id AND tp.deleted_at IS NULL LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS count FROM teacher_certifications WHERE status = 2 AND deleted_at IS NULL GROUP BY user_id ) cert_count ON u.id = cert_count.user_id WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND u.role = 2 AND u.status = 1 AND u.deleted_at IS NULL

SELECT DISTINCT s.id, s.code, s.name, s.sort_order FROM teacher_teachings tt INNER JOIN teaching_stages s ON tt.stage_id = s.id WHERE tt.user_id = #{userId} AND tt.status = 1 AND tt.deleted_at IS NULL AND s.status = 1 AND s.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY s.sort_order, s.id

SELECT tt.id, tt.stage_id, st.name AS stage_name, tt.subject_id, su.name AS subject_name, tt.price_per_hour FROM teacher_teachings tt INNER JOIN teaching_stages st ON tt.stage_id = st.id INNER JOIN subjects su ON tt.subject_id = su.id WHERE tt.user_id = #{userId} AND tt.status = 1 AND tt.deleted_at IS NULL AND st.status = 1 AND st.deleted_at IS NULL AND su.status = 1 AND su.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY st.sort_order, st.id, su.sort_order, su.id

SELECT id, weekday, TIME_FORMAT(start_time, '%H:%i:%s') AS start_time, TIME_FORMAT(end_time, '%H:%i:%s') AS end_time, schedule_type, DATE_FORMAT(start_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS start_date, DATE_FORMAT(end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS end_date FROM teacher_schedules WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 1 AND deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY schedule_type, weekday, start_time
